channel.title: Limit bandwidth usage on a certain computer
channel.description: I have a family member that is constantly downloading something via torrents, and it gets so bad during some points that the internet just crashes and restarts. I was wondering if there was anyone to limit the amount of bandwidth they can use, so I can still use the internet without experiencing any slowdowns.

item.title: Limit bandwidth usage on a certain computer
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Yz85Racer:

I set up a QoS service in my house for the exact same reason. Most modems have them available, check your router’s homepage.

That is what i did too
Also try adjusting the Max Transmission Unit(MTU) in your router. It chooses the largest packet size that can be sent at once. You need a higher quality router to be able to choose the port priority though. Same issue on my PS3… (PS3 has ability to set custom MTU as well)
